title: 4. Pathian ropui rawh se chhandamna petu
lyrics:
Pathian ropui rawh se, chhandamna petu,
Khawvel hmangaih vangin a Fapa min pe;
Kan sual tlanna tura a nunna pein,
Chhandamna kawng a hawng, mi tin luh theih nan.

Fak rawh u, fak rawh u, khawvel mi tinrengin,
Fak rawh u, fak rawh u, mi zawng zawngin fak r'u;
Pa hnenah lo kal r'u, Lal Isua ringin,
Chhandamna, chatuana nunna nei turin.

Thisena lei, aw, chhandamna famkim chu,
Ringtu zawng zawngte tana Pa thutiam chu,
Mi sual ber pawhin hei hi an rin duh chuan,
Lal Isua ngaihdamna a chang nghal ngei ang.

Thil ropui tiin, thil ropui min zirtir,
Kan lawmna ber, hlimna ber kan chan hun tur chu,
Chhandamtu Lal Isua hnen kan thlen hunah.
